basicInfo.name: Chloe
basicInfo.flavor: When Vaughan randomly brought home a mysterious chest, Chloe opened it to find all sorts of items. After taking Vaughan's advice, she began to sell them.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Kitty Gratitude
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Unable to Recover. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 108% of Magic Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).

Skill 2.name: Cleaning Time
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants All Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: All Attack Boost to 20%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 27% Crit Rate Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Kitty Dance
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 22% of the caster's Max HP upon activating a skill 1 time(s).
 - All Allies
 - Grants Shock Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Shock Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 22% of Max HP upon activating a skill 1 time(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Chloe: Vaughan, cats, Rook, pudding, chocolate, cookies, shiny things, pranks, fun books, card games / Vaughan: Chloe, seriousness, wishes, being thorough, innocence
profile.dislikes: Chloe: People with evil hearts, difficult books or stories, dogs / Vaughan: Everything that threatens Chloe, dogs, frivolity
profile.story: When Vaughan randomly brought home a mysterious chest, Chloe opened it to find all sorts of items. After taking Vaughan's advice, she began to sell them.

basicInfo.name: Chloe
basicInfo.flavor: Luck began to follow Chloe. When put in dangerous situations, she always seemed to find a way out. She hasn't noticed this yet and is simply enjoying her life with Vaughan.

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants All Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Kitty Dance
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Shock Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Shock Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

basicInfo.name: Chloe
basicInfo.flavor: Chloe adopted an abandoned cat named Vaughan. One day, when she touched the top of her head, she discovered that she had grown cat ears and a tail. She was thrilled that she'd become a cat too!
